# Boots of Speed
## Overview
**Aura** moderate transmutation; **CL** 10th

**Slot** feet

**Price** 12,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

As a free action, the wearer can click her heels together, letting her act as though affected by a *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]* spell for up to 10 rounds each day. The *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]* effectâ€™s duration need not be consecutive rounds.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*

**Cost** 6,000 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 503
